snippet: State Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, now engulfed in accusations of sexual harassment, demands loyalty, but some criticize what they call heavy-handed tactics.
abstract: New York State Assemblyman Vito J Lopez, now engulfed in accusations of sexual harassment, has long presided over a Brooklyn Democratic political machine that rewarded proteges and friends with jobs, benefited favored contractors and bolstered his standing as one of the last of New York City's kingmakers; Lopez was a little-known figure outside of Brooklyn and Albany before the accusations of sexual harassment surfaced.

byline.original: By N. R. KLEINFIELD, WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN
byline.contributor: Alain Delaquérière and Michael M. Grynbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: State Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, now engulfed in accusations of sexual harassment, demands loyalty, but some criticize what they call heavy-handed tactics.

headline.seo: Assemblyman Lopez Is a Fierce Politician Who Tolerates No Dissent, Associates Say
headline.main: If This Brooklyn Kingmaker Is Asking, Saying No Is Risky Option
headline.print_headline: If This Brooklyn Kingmaker Is Asking, Saying No Is Risky Option
